sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pAAV.hSyn.FLEX.SYFP2-POST-T2A-dTomato.FLEX.WPRE.SV40 was a gift from Marcel Bruchez (Addgene plasmid # 105983 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:105983 ; RRID:Addgene_105983)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: loxP

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: 2A peptide from Thosea asigna virus capsid protein
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Eukaryotic ribosomes fail to insert a peptide bond between the Gly and Pro residues, yielding separate polypeptides.
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: T2A
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T2A

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:tagsFusionProteins: SYFP2-POST (N terminal on insert) T2A-dTomato (C terminal on insert) myc (N terminal on insert)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:growthInstructions: Plasmid is very unstable, screen clones for recombination. Grow at 28oC if possible.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: This AAV plasmid in the presence of Cre recombinase expresses an extracellular SYFP2 fused to the neuroligin-1 cytoplasmic domain for targeting to the synapse with a cell fill dTomato..

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: This AAV plasmid in the presence of Cre recombinase expresses an extracellular SYFP2 fused to the neuroligin-1 cytoplasmic domain for targeting to the synapse with a cell fill dTomato.
